EmailTemplate.subject: Your $10 OFF Won’t Last Long
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Spread A Little Office Cheer With Gifts For All Your Office Peers!
Find Holiday gifts your coworkers will love & get $10 OFF your purchase! Use code 19GIFT10 at checkout. Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBPRELOGINNOVHOLIDAYGIFTS19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Gift Guide <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Coffee/_/N-dvy?cmp=EBPRELOGINNOVHOLIDAYGIFTS19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>

For The Office Administrator Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Pop-Up-Note-Dispensers/_/N-alt?cmp=EBPRELOGINNOVHOLIDAYGIFTS19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Remember your $10 OFF code won’t last forever. Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 19GIFT10 at checkout. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires November 14, 2019.
